AsyncTrigger.mode

機能/意味
mode
タイプ
AsyncTriggerクラスのプロパティ (読み書き可能)
説明
　Indicates the mode of operation. You can also set a value.
　Specify one of the following values:
atmNormal : Fired during normal event delivery.
atmExclusive : Fired over other asynchronous events
atmAtIdle : Fired when idle (no more events to broadcast).
　When the trigger is fired at the same time, the firing order is atmExclusive, atmNormal, atmIdle.
　If multiple triggers of the same mode are fired, fire in the order in which the triggers were fired.
参照
Timer.mode
